attributes.action: Enforce supermarket employers to provide safety clothing (gloves and masks)
attributes.additional_details: Reduce the spread of the virus.
attributes.background: Supermarket employees handle money and products touched by a customer who may be infected by the Coronavirus. The employee may catch the virus and pass it on to the next customer and take it home to the family. The customer may cough or sneeze. Customers should be forced to keep 2 metres apart.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305874

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
